name: The Third Scattering
description:
This game is a match-3 played with cards. :-)

Instead of swapping tiles, there is a cursor that highlights one tile.

The cursor can be moved around by playing cards (shown below the board).

Use the swap card (leftmost card) to try and make a match by swapping the tile under the cursor with an adjacent one. If no swap is possible, a life is lost. Game is over when there are no lives left.

See the info button inside the game for more on how to play.

NOTE FOR WINDOWS BINARY: you need to tell Windows  10 this game supports Hi DPI by right clicking the executable, selecting "Properties", "Compatibility" and clicking on "Override High DPI scaling behavior. Scaling performed by Application."

Game made with Godot.
